replies.body: Not cool. We voted for a demonic skin that had very little blue overtone. This has massive blue glows and effects that overpower everything else. It looks bad over all. Bottom line don't make the community feel like they are involved by letting them vote then go a different direction with it.

> [{quoted}](name=BCETracks,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=q2n0yERi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-14T18:28:44.810+0000)
>
> Not cool. We voted for a demonic skin that had very little blue overtone. This has massive blue glows and effects that overpower everything else. It looks bad over all. Bottom line don't make the community feel like they are involved by letting them vote then go a different direction with it.

I think they made it blue so its not as simular to dragon trainer tristina skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Gorderkiller,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=q2n0yERi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-05-14T18:54:08.967+0000)
>
> I think they made it blue so its not as simular to dragon trainer tristina skin.

I dont think it would have looked similar regardless, and  I don't think the color scheme needed to be changed to accomplish that. Voted on one thing got another.
9.11 looks really empty if this is the only thing coming out.

From the voting choices, she looked a lot more pink and less blue/grey then... hence why I voted for this one =(  I'd of voted for to sugar rush if I knew this is how the final was going to look.  More pink!
